CONTRACT_ID: Nutanix Acropolis (AOS) Ultimate Software License & Production Software Support Service - 1189
short_summary: Shared Services Canada requires the provision of Nutanix Acropolis Ultimate Software License & production Software Support Service.
description: The procurement describes the requirement for Nutanix Acropolis Ultimate Software License & production Software Support Service from Shared Services Canada. The procurement requires a software license for the provision of services. The procurement does not apply to procurement in Canada-Panama and does not justify a minor procurement in another country
